chapter.text: I won't bore you much longer with all of my problems. ^1500That would take a lot more words than I can fit in the time we have left. ^1500I’m more interested in you. ^1500It’s nice to finally speak to you through something that's only a little more than words on a screen. ^1500There’s a lot about you that I don’t understand, but yet I feel like I know you all better than I know myself.
